revtext: It was a wonderful experience at their store choosing the wig. They have a wide option to chose from and are very patient and courteous to find the right one for you. Thank you
revreply: Thank you so much for your kind words and appreciation. We are thrilled to note that you had a memorable experience at our hair studio. We strive to make a difference in every person\'s life who connects with our brand. Our managers are committed to ensure it happens. Wishing you the best
